forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 55. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the city of San Francisco awakens under a canopy of stillness, the night yields to a clear, gentle resolve. The temperature hovers around a comfortably mild 55 degrees, cradled by a soft southwest breeze whispering through the streets. Anticipation hangs in the air for the day ahead, set to unfold under the warm embrace of sunshine. By midday, the golden sunlight will drape over the city, inviting all to bask in its glow, though a subtle coolness will settle in the afternoon as temperatures meander downwards to around 61 degrees.

Visibility appears promising this morning, with no heavy fog to shroud the iconic landscape. As the day breaks, expect clarity—perhaps even a distant view of the Golden Gate Bridge standing proud against the horizon. For those wandering outdoors, a light layering of clothing would serve well: a breezy shirt complemented by a jacket to fend off the afternoon chill will ensure comfort as you navigate through the city’s vibrant avenues. With such delightful weather, it might be an ideal time to enjoy a leisurely stroll atop Ocean Beach, savor a quiet moment at a café, or explore the winding streets of the Mission, perhaps indulging in the culinary delights that await. The hues of the day beckon for an excursion, one that embraces both the energy of the city and the tranquility of the moment.
